text: Julio César Toresani (5 December 1967 – 22 April 2019) was an Argentine football player and manager. He played in the midfield. Toresani was born in Santa Fe. He played for Unión de Santa Fe, Instituto, River Plate, Colón de Santa Fe, Boca Juniors, Independiente, Audax Italiano and Patronato. He later managed many clubs, beginng at San Martín de San Juan from 2005 to 2006. His later coaching role was at Rampla Juniors from November 2018 until he was fired in February 2019. Toresani died by suicide on 22 April 2019 in Santa Fe. He was 51. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine football managers Category:Sportspeople from Santa Fe, Argentina Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide
title: Julio César Toresani
